message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm asking for $20000 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Alice, your product sounds interesting, but $20000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. I'm willing to offer $15000.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $15000 is my minimum, I believe the value of this product is closer to my initial offer.  How about we meet in the middle at $17500? It's a fair price that reflects both our interests.
Alice, I understand you're firm on your price, but $17500 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $16000.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
